It's been ten years since Portal 2 was released, and it's an undeniable classic. It was the game that got me into Steam in the first place!  The physics in this game are a work of art, I'm always so impressed with how seamlessly you can pass through the portals. Not to mention the hilarious comedy. I wish I could play Co-Op.

This game is so cool. I'm not sure how it is single player but me and my bf played is split screen. We each had a robot character that could make 2 portals and we had to figure out how to reach the exit. I guess it's kinda like an escape game XD except more like a puzzle. Some of them are really challenging and you have to think hard to figure out where to place the portals to get to a different part in the building. Play it with someone smart lol, I wouldn't recommend this for little kids, you will be stuck on level 1 forever XD
